title: Moderna, Coinbase, Occidental, Royal Caribbean: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Vaccine makers were extending gains; Travel stocks were clawing back some of last week’s losses
body:
Stock futures are rising, putting Wall Street on course to stabilize after last week’s Omicron-variant selloff. Here’s what we’re watching in Monday’s trading:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
